amendment.description: To enhance customer focus on intelligence and to ensure independent intelligence analyses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3808 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S10217-10218; text: CR S1017) To enhance customer focus on intelligence and to ensure independent intelligence analyses.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3808 proposed by Senator Levin.
